member.summary: DefaultTextureAtlasElementAtlas is the specific TextureAtlas class for the element DefaultTextureAtlasElement. Due to limitation of C# genericity systeme you need to create a "real" TextureAtlas class for each type of inherited TextureAtlasElement. Just need to create a name for serialisation purpose. To work property you also need to create a specific custom inspector the way DefaultTextureAtlasElementAtlasCustomInspector do.
